title: Pakistan: a two-part nation
creator_credit: Suzanne Talbot Isaacs and McGraw-Hill Films
brief_description: A study of East and West Pakistan, this film views the problems which arise from differences in people, geography and economy, between the two. Amidst uncertainty that threatens progress, the two Pakistans are held together by their religious tie of Islam.
